summary: Change 1H weapon Forward-Power attack animations to became thrust!
descriptionHtml:
[center]Change 1H weapon Forward-Power attack animations to became thrust!
This mod replace 1H weapon type\'s animation. That\'s means 1H blunt also included

[youtube]PIHjxy7lZJ8[/youtube]  [youtube]I9V087SSV4c[/youtube]
 [/center]

TL;DR for me to type a description, I made this just on a whim since I don\'t like vanilla one. I don\'t consider something like immersion while making this but to have fun while playing. Since I do have fun, I share it.

My other mod that I updated recently
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XPMS[/url]

author: xp32
